categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War in 5 ABY, New Republic General Hera Syndulla and her forces aboard the Star Destroyer Deliverance, had spent a week smashing Imperial blockades in the Nythlide Array. Syndulla reported on the status of her battle group, in which she stated that two carriers under Major Jaun would stay to support the local militia after they had successfully punched through the blockade, and that the Deliverance was to return to its primary objective of hunting down the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing.
